casebody.data:
Charles Thompson v. Commissioner of Correction (9637)

Daly, O’Connell and Heiman, Js.

Argued June 4 decision released June 25, 1991 Michael J. Isko, assistant public defender, for the appellant (petitioner). James M. Ralls, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, was Robert Brunetti, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (respondent). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
